content.prompt: Dr. Levine is interested in studying how one's sexual orientation influences behavior. Which of the following explains why it is important for Dr. Levine to provide an operational definition of sexual orientation in the research plan?

choices.label: The operational definition helps everyone involved with the research understand and collect data in the same manner.
The operational definition assures that the data will be approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB).
The operational definition makes sure that the data is collected in an ethical manner.
The operational definition allows the researchers to infer causation.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
